question: Mridula Sarabhai was associated with which among the following events?
option3: Restoration of communal amity and harmony during partition
explanation: Mridula Sarabhai was daughter of Sarla and Ambalal Sarabhai. Ambalal sarabhai was a famous businessman of Ahemedabad. She took part in Salt Satyagraha of 1930 and Rajkot Satyagraha of 1938. She was also active during the INA Trials. She also took part in the restoration of communal amity and harmony during partition of India.
